_sText:
Hello guys ! (sorry for my bad english)

What ? A new map by NikO ? YEAAAAAAAH!!!!
It's a beautiful minigame map with 10 levels!! hehe!!
I added cubemaps, nice lighting some background musics, custom textures and models!

<iframe title="YouTube video player" width="803" height="460" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/ognalranoPI?rel=0&hd=1" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
So, the levels are :

**-GUN :**
======
level in a tower under construction
**-SNIPER :**
=========
level in a castle
**-SUBMACHINE GUN :**
=================
A level in an childish environment =)
**-GRENADE :**
==========
Level in the space ! with gravity !
**-MACHINE GUN :**
============== 
Level in a dust environment, like a small d2 without the same architecture =)
**-KNIFE :**
========
Level on a beach with sun !!
**-RIFLE :**
========
A level where I had reproduce the Halo environment
**-AUTONOOB :**
===========
A level in a canyon environment, like in the big canyon 
**-SHOTGUN :**
==========
A level in the aztec environment, like in de_aztec
**-ULTIMATE :**
===========
A level where you have to use your nightvision to see your enemies !! It's the ultimate level !! (surprise)

I added a lot of other things in this map like a crown for the first who can choose a level, or for example a very original spawn.

ENJOY !

[http://www.niko-mapping-studio.tk](http://www.niko-mapping-studio.tk "http://www.niko-mapping-studio.tk")
